name: klout.bet
description: This project transforms social media engagement into a live trading experience by tokenising posts into dynamic markets. Each tweet becomes a tradeable asset powered by a bonding-curve mechanism that reacts to real-time engagementâ€”likes, reposts, views, and comments. Users can buy and sell positions based on the virality potential of content, effectively enabling prediction markets around social engagement. The platform introduces a new asset class where social sentiment becomes liquidity. It bridges Web2 behaviours with Web3 trading incentives, allowing users to speculate on the performance of social content in a transparent, gamified and on-chain environment. This creates a new social-finance ecosystem driven by engagement, virality and market sentiment.
